joint_involvement.justification: Multiple small joints (2nd-5th MTPs, thumb IPs, wrists)

serology.justification: Both markers below threshold (negative RF and negative anti-CCP)

duration.justification: No explicit mention of duration or clinical notes on the patient history

treatment_context.justification: No evidence of DMARD use in treatment description

classification_rationale: The patient meets the criteria for RA+, but the ACR/EULAR classification requires a total score of ≥6/10. The current score is 4, which falls below this threshold. The negative serology (negative RF and negative anti-CCP) also further supports a negative classification.
